passages.text:
{Narrator-Player-null-false-1-null}
The forest surrounds you, blotting out most details of the surroundings, though you can make out the shape of some tower to the south. Thankfully, there are several paths cutting through the forest you can take from here. The cabin in front of you seems occupied with smoke rising from its chimney and animal skins left out to dry in a shed besides the main structure. Approach the cabin or move on?

[[Approach Cabin]] 
[[Leave]]
passages.name: Inspect Surroundings

passages.text:
{Narrator-Player-null-false-1-null}
The door to the cabin seems sturdy enough at a glance and you can hear movement inside. Breaking in would be difficult and surely agitate whoever dwells within. What will you do?

[[Try Knocking]]
[[Knock Again]]
[[Break In]]
[[Leave]]
passages.name: Approach Cabin

passages.text:
{Narrator-Player-null-false-1-null}
You've seen enough. Where will you go next? 

=-North-> A path leads deep into the forest
=-East--> Signage along this path indicates that it leads to Mt. Spartan.
=-South-> A path winds its way towards a lone tower in the distance.
=-West--> A path leads deep into the forest

[[North]]
[[East]]
[[South]]
[[West]]
passages.name: Leave

passages.text:
{Rugged Man-Player-null-true-1-null}
I thought I told ya'll that I have no meat left to spare! I can barely keep myself fed let alone make a living like this!

[[Food?]]
[[What do you mean?]] 
[[Threaten Success]] 
[[Threaten Failure]]
passages.name: Knock

passages.text:
{Narrator-Player-null-false-1-null}
You get ready to break the door down, no matter what is inside. What will you use to accomplish this?

[[Destroy with Thunderbolt]]
[[Destroy with FireBolt]]
[[Destroy with ForceBurst]]
[[Destroy with Chop Weapon]]
[[Tear it off its Hinges]]
[[Try to tear it off its Hinges]]
[[Change your Mind]]

links.name: Try to tear it off its Hinges
links.link: Try to tear it off its Hinges

passages.name: Break In
What do you mean?
Food?
Threaten Success
Threaten Failure

passages.text:
{Rugged Man-Player-null-true-1-null}
Well kid, have you tried shooting at them? You know, using something with range? That's typically how hunting works.

[[Haven't Shot at Them]]
[[Tried to Shoot at Them]]
passages.name: Have you tried shooting it?
Knock Again
Destroy with FireBolt

passages.text:
{Narrator-Player-hasChopWeapon-true-1-fightRuggedHunter}
You look down at your weapon and smile. It has just the right edge for chopping and would make short work of the door. 

Your weapon makes contact with the wood with a boom that sends nearby birds flying from their nests. You hear movement from inside, best not to stop now. Another chop sends splinters flying into the dirt. One more, and you can see inside. A final hit, and the wood surrounding the doorknob is hacked clean off, leaving the door to slide lazily on its hinges.

The man inside draws a knife from his belt and gets ready for combat. With a grin, you do the same.
passages.name: Destroy with Chop Weapon
Tear it off its Hinges
Destroy with ForceBurst
Destroy with Thunderbolt

passages.text:
{Narrator-Player Man-null-false-1-null}
On second thought, breaking and entering isn't what you would like to do today.

[[Leave]]
[[Try Knocking]]
passages.name: Change your Mind

passages.text:
{Narrator-Player-null-false-1-travelSherpaHut}
You follow the direction the signage points to. If nothing else, the elevation of the mountain will make naviation easier.
passages.name: East

passages.text:
{Narrator-Player-null-false-1-travelRuinedCastle}
That tower in the distance intrigues you. What could it contain, and what else is around it?
passages.name: South

passages.text:
{Narrator-Player-null-false-1-travelIngredientsBetweenHunterBandit}
You trudge along the barely visible path deeper into the forest.
passages.name: West

passages.text:
{Narrator-Player-null-false-1-travelIngredientsBetweenHunterFarm}
You trudge along the barely visible path deeper into the forest.
passages.name: North
Haven't Shot at Them
Tried to Shoot at Them
Please go Away
Yay food
You aren't with Them
Who?

passages.text:
{Rugged Man-Player-null-true-1-null}
Who else would I be referring to stone-brain? I'm talking about that bandit gang to the west. They've been bleeding me dry of any game I kill to the point I'm having trouble feeding myself, let alone enough to make a living. 

[[Where are the Bandits]]
[[How many are there]]
[[Give me whatever you have]]
[[I want your stuff]]
passages.name: The Bandits
Where are the Bandits
How many are there
Give me whatever you have
How about no
Don't Hurt Me

passages.text:
{Narrator-Player-null-true-1-null}
The man slams the door in your face so hard it rocks on its hinges and you can hear the faint clunk of the lock engaging once again.

[[Knock Again]] 
[[Leave]]
passages.name: He does This

passages.text:
{Narrator-Player-null-true-1-null}
You grab the bundle of furs from the man, running your hands over them in the process. They're of some kind of small game animal and are as soft as silk. Before you can appreciate the many more however, the man shoves you out of the doorframe and back outside. The door slams shut before you can react.

[[Knock Again]] 
[[Break In]] 
[[Leave]]
passages.name: Take the Furs
I want your stuff

passages.text:
{Rugged Man-Player-null-true-1-null}
I haven't ever been to their camp myself to see, but they always send at least five men over every time they want to extort me. And given how they've burned so many homes and an entire town to the ground, I would say that there's a sizable amount of them

[[Where are the Bandits]] 
[[I'll take them out for you]]

links.name: I'll take them out for you
links.link: I'll take them out for you

passages.name: How Many

passages.text:
{Rugged Man-Player-null-true-1-null}
They're held up in the ruins of old Lamba, a small town they overrun and destroyed. It's to the west, just past the ruins of Fort Randal. 

[[How many are there]] 
[[I'll take them out for you]]

links.name: I'll take them out for you
links.link: I'll take them out for you

passages.name: Where they are
I'll take them out for you
Good Luck

passages.text:
{Narrator-Player-null-true-1-null}
You step back outside of the doorframe and he closes the door behind you. You hear the lock clunk into place as you step away.
[[Knock Again]] 
[[Leave]]
passages.name: Now Leave
Try to tear it off its Hinges
Try Knocking
